## Events.Abstract class

Abstract class for an event.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class Abstract 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)()](./blockly.events.abstract._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Abstract</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [group](./blockly.events.abstract.group.md) |  | string | <p>An ID for the group of events this block is associated with.</p><p>Groups define events that should be treated as an single action from the user's perspective, and should be undone together.</p> |
|  [isBlank](./blockly.events.abstract.isblank.md) | <code>abstract</code> | boolean | Whether or not the event was constructed without necessary parameters (to be populated by fromJson). |
|  [isUiEvent](./blockly.events.abstract.isuievent.md) |  | boolean | Whether or not the event is a UI event. |
|  [recordUndo](./blockly.events.abstract.recordundo.md) |  | boolean | Whether this event is undoable or not. |
|  [type](./blockly.events.abstract.type.md) |  | string | Type of this event. |
|  [workspaceId?](./blockly.events.abstract.workspaceid.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The workspace identifier for this event. |
